content.raw:
That will be ideal, thanks! And then we can close this PR. That will make it much easier to test with `ign-gazebo`.

It should be more or less these steps:

```
hg pull
hg up ign-physics2
hg branch trivial_physics_engine_citadel
hg revert -r trivial_physics_engine tpesim
# Manually copy the root CmakeLists.txt changes
# compile and run tests
# then if everything is ok:
hg commit -m "Porting TPE to Citadel"
hg push --new
```
